CTIS_TOKEN_VALIDATOR_CLASS - Static variable in class org.logica.ctis.security.SecurityService
classname of a TokenValidator to be used

I

init(AgentContainer, Profile) - Method in class org.logica.ctis.security.SecurityService
In this init the TokenValidator or TokenProvider is initialized, as well as the trustedAgents.
isMandatory() - Method in class org.logica.ctis.security.SecurityService

O

org.logica.ctis.security - package org.logica.ctis.security
This simple SecurityService fascilitates making sure only agents with a token that can be validated will be allowed to join the Jade Platform.

S

SecurityService - Class in org.logica.ctis.security
This simple SecurityService fascilitates making sure only agents with a token that can be validated will be allowed to join the Jade Platform.
SecurityService() - Constructor for class org.logica.ctis.security.SecurityService
 

T

TOKENKEY - Static variable in class org.logica.ctis.security.SecurityService
name of the userdefined slot used for storing and retreiving the token.
TokenProvider - Interface in org.logica.ctis.security
Implementors can for example follow a login procedure to retreive a token (sessionid,...) for the name argument.
TokenValidator - Interface in org.logica.ctis.security
Implementors can for example call a isValid(token) function of an external LDAP.
